structure.unit: Inspection And Sale Of Food, Drugs And Various Articles

law.catch_line: Inspection Of Bakeries; Notice To Owner, Etc., Of Failure To Comply With Law; Remedy
law.text: If, after inspection, it is found that a bakery is not constructed, maintained, operated or the distribution of its products not conducted in accordance with sections two to six, inclusive, and sections nine F to nine J, inclusive, written notice shall be given to the owner or manager, stating the delinquency, and fixing a reasonable time within which the same shall be remedied and for hearing any party in interest.
